In response to the commenting editor - this is a bit much, quite unecessary for a reasonable explanation of what anti-christian consitutes. The quote anyway is from bishops and therefore [[WP:POV]] and not [[WP:RELY]] for this article.
rv - vandalism of one church is not evidence that it is common. the vandalism isn't necessarily anti-Christian anyway. It could just be plain delinquency.

/* United States */ I'm not finding this (and would LIKE to!). Sounds apochryphal. Probably only be Christian pub IF found. Not sure Muhammed can't be considered historical figure anyway and therefore religiously neutral in most schools.
